Uses of Package
com.sri.kernel

Packages that use com.sri.kernel
com.sri.kernel Provides the core classes of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.comm Contains classes used for communications. 
com.sri.kernel.i2c Contains classes used in managing and using the I2C Bus. 
com.sri.kernel.modules Contains classes which make up the module system of the SR4 Kernel. 
com.sri.kernel.srml Provides classes for managing SRML elements and parsing SRML documents. 
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel used by com.sri.kernel
Configuration
           Represents the configuration for the system.
Diagnostics
           A class to manage module diagnostics.
Logger
           This is the core logging class for all components created or loaded by the SR4 Kernel.
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel used by com.sri.kernel.comm
SR4Kernel
           This is the main class for the SR4 Kernel.
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel used by com.sri.kernel.i2c
Configuration
           Represents the configuration for the system.
 

Classes in com.sri.kernel used by com.sri.kernel.modules

           A class to manage module diagnostics.

           This is the core logging class for all components created or loaded by the SR4 Kernel.
